subItems.medical: Stem Cell, Bone Marrow & Critical Medical Transport

hero.description: Precision. Urgency. Reliability. Specialized transport for life-saving medical shipments.

intro.title: Introducing OBC Life Care
intro.description1: At OBC Care, we specialize in delivering time-critical shipments across industries. While we are widely trusted for AOG parts, aviation components, and critical logistics, we also provide specialized services for life-saving medical shipments such as stem cells, bone marrow, and other biological materials.
intro.description2: To ensure these critical medical shipments are handled with the care and expertise they require, we have introduced OBC Life Care, our dedicated division focused exclusively on medical and biological transport.
intro.description3: OBC Life Care is designed to meet the unique needs of hospitals, research labs, donor registries, and biotechnology companies. We plan and execute rapid, temperature controlled, and fully compliant transport solutions for life saving medical shipments.
intro.description4: Every shipment is a mission to save lives. We carefully plan each transport, ensuring temperature controlled handling, regulatory compliance, and real-time monitoring, so these vital materials reach patients and research facilities safely and on time. With OBC Life Care, your stem cells, bone marrow, and other critical medical shipments are always in expert hands.

whatWeHandle.title: What We Handle
whatWeHandle.description: At OBC Life Care, every transport we manage supports life-saving treatments, scientific research, and medical innovation. We specialize in the secure, time sensitive, and temperature-controlled transportation of critical medical materials, including:

howWeSaveLives.title: How We Save Lives

0.title: Coordination & Planning
0.description: Every transport begins with meticulous planning. We handle permits, customs clearance, and courier scheduling, ensuring full compliance and providing clients with all necessary documentation.

1.title: Real-Time Tracking
1.description: Clients stay informed at every stage with automatic updates, dedicated contacts, and full transparency from pickup to delivery.

2.title: Urgent & Same-Day Solutions
2.description: When time is critical, we offer same day delivery for urgent collections, including second apheresis if needed, adjusting quickly to flight schedules and optimized routes.

3.title: Temperature-Controlled Transit
3.description: Using validated systems and data loggers, we maintain precise temperature stability for stem cells, bone marrow, and biological materials, with real-time alerts to protect shipment integrity.

4.title: Compliance & Security
4.description: All shipments adhere to international health, safety, and ethical regulations. Strict security protocols safeguard materials against loss, theft, or unauthorized access.

5.title: Emergency Contingencies
5.description: Predefined protocols allow us to respond swiftly to delays or equipment issues, ensuring viability under any circumstance.

howWeSaveLives.closing:
Plan. Execute. Save Lives.
With OBC Life Care, every stem cell, bone marrow, and cord blood shipment is carefully planned, securely transported, and closely monitored, ensuring that life saving materials reach those who need them most.

cta.title: Learn More About OBC Life Care
cta.description: For detailed information on our specialized medical transport services, click here to visit the OBC Life Care website and see how we combine speed, safety, and medical expertise to deliver life-saving biological materials.
cta.subtext: Ensure your critical medical shipments are delivered with precision, care, and urgency.

0.smallLine: Fast. Secure. Reliable. We move your time-critical shipments across the globe, 24/7.

1.smallLine: Our 24/7 Onboard Courier team ensures the fastest, safest, and most transparent hand-carry delivery from pickup to final handover.

2.smallLine: Your urgent shipment is personally escorted door-to-door, monitored in real time, and delivered exactly when you need it.

AboutSection.label: About Us
AboutSection.title: About OBC Care
AboutSection.subtitle: Your Global Partner in Time-Critical Logistics
AboutSection.p1: At OBC Care, we move what matters most: from production spare parts and AOG shipments to automotive components and electronic equipment.
AboutSection.p2: We're trusted by businesses worldwide to handle high-value, urgent shipments with precision, reliability, and full transparency.

0.title: Multi-Industry Logistics Solutions
0.description: We specialize in mission-critical deliveries for aircraft parts, industrial spares, electronics, fashion items, and sensitive documents worldwide.

1.title: Complete Door-to-Door Service
1.description: From pickup to handover, every stage is managed by our professional team with care and accuracy.

2.title: Global Reach, Local Expertise
2.description: With a worldwide network of trusted partners, we deliver seamlessly across continents and time zones.

3.title: Real-Time Updates
3.description: Stay informed at every milestone. Our OBC team keeps you updated in real time, from pick-up to final delivery.

LogisticsAdvantage.label: Our Advantage
LogisticsAdvantage.title: Fast, Secure, and Global Our Logistics Advantage
LogisticsAdvantage.subtitle: Your deadlines drive us.
LogisticsAdvantage.p1: OBC Care provides end-to-end logistics solutions designed for industries that can’t afford delays: <bold>aviation, automotive, and electronics.</bold>
LogisticsAdvantage.p2: We coordinate first and last mile deliveries, onboard couriers, customs clearance, and next-flight-out (NFO) arrangements to ensure every shipment arrives when it's needed most.
LogisticsAdvantage.p3: Whether it's across the city or across the world, we move faster, think smarter, and deliver with care.

ServicesCTA.title: Need a Time-Critical Delivery?
ServicesCTA.description: Whether it’s an urgent aircraft part or a last-minute production component, we deliver with speed, precision, and full visibility, <bold>around the clock.</bold>
ServicesCTA.cardDescription: Priority handling, real-time updates, and dedicated experts for your most critical moves, <bold>anywhere in the world.</bold>

Footer.followText: Stay connected with us for logistics insights and updates:

ServicesBanner.title:
Delivering Precision-Driven
Logistics Solutions
ServicesBanner.description: For time-critical shipments across the globe from AOG and automotive parts to electronics and industrial components.

header.label: Our Core Services
header.title:
Priority
Logistics Solutions
header.p1: At OBC Care, we understand that <bold>downtime costs money</bold>. That's why we provide priority logistics solutions tailored for industries that demand speed, security, and global reach.
header.p2: Our expertise ensures that every shipment big or small arrives <green>safely, swiftly, and seamlessly</green>.

0.title: First Mile / Last Mile (FM/LM) Delivery
0.description: Seamless pickup and delivery from origin to final destination.

1.title: Onboard Courier (OBC) Service
1.description: When every second counts, our professional couriers personally escort your shipment with utmost priority.

2.title: Customs Clearance Assistance
2.description: We simplify the complex. Our customs experts handle every detail of international customs coordination.

3.title: Next Flight Out (NFO) Solutions
3.description: When speed is everything, NFO ensures your shipment takes off on the next available flight.

header.label: How We Operate
header.title:
Efficient Process,
Transparent Results
header.p1: At OBC Care, <bold>every minute matters</bold>. That's why our process is designed to be efficient, transparent, and fully customized for your shipment's urgency, route, and industry.
header.p2: Here's how we make it happen:

0.title: Request & Assessment
0.description: Submit your shipment details our operations team will evaluate the fastest route and provide a quote within 15 minutes.

1.title: Booking & Documentation
1.description: Once confirmed, we book all flights and prepare all necessary paperwork, including customs documentation, to ensure a smooth transport.

2.title: Collection & Handover
2.description: A trained courier picks up your shipment and prepares it for departure.

3.title: Real-Time Updates
3.description: From pickup to delivery, we send live status updates at every milestone.

4.title: Final Delivery Confirmation
4.description: Once your shipment arrives, you'll receive instant proof of delivery safely and on time.

header.label: Flexible Delivery Options
header.title: Built for Every Route and Requirement
header.description: We tailor each transport solution to fit your operation's needs whether it's time-critical, sensitive, or high-value cargo.

door-to-door.title: Door-to-Door
door-to-door.description: Complete pickup and delivery from sender to receiver full convenience, zero hassle.

airport-to-airport.title: Airport-to-Airport
airport-to-airport.description: Ideal for international freight coordination from origin to destination airports efficiently.

door-to-airport.title: Door-to-Airport
door-to-airport.description: Perfect for shippers sending goods abroad we handle local pickup, packaging, and airline dispatch.

airport-to-door.title: Airport-to-Door
airport-to-door.description: We take over once your shipment lands handling customs and fast last-mile delivery to your receiver.

header.label: How We Move Your Shipments
header.title: Fast. Secure. Global.
header.description: Every delivery is different that’s why we customize our logistics approach for efficiency and precision.

air.title: Air Transport (Onboard & Cargo Flights)
air.description: Our couriers travel with or coordinate your shipment via the fastest route available, ensuring priority handling and zero delays.

ground.title: Ground Transport
ground.description: For short or regional routes, we provide direct, door-to-door ground delivery with GPS tracking and standby drivers for continuous movement.

items.1: Secure handling and custody at every transfer point
items.2: Verified couriers and partner checks for full accountability

ShipmentMethods.imageCaption: OBC missions, FM/LM or NFO in action priority handling worldwide.

ObcBanner.title: From airport to doorstep hand‑carried, monitored, and delivered with care.
ObcBanner.description: We move your most time‑critical, high‑value shipments with priority handling and full visibility 24/7, worldwide.

ObcWhatIs.badge: What Is an Onboard Courier Service?
ObcWhatIs.title: Fastest and most secure way to move urgent shipments worldwide
ObcWhatIs.p1: An Onboard Courier (OBC) service is the fastest and most secure way to move urgent shipments across the globe.
ObcWhatIs.p2: A professional courier personally carries your shipment as hand luggage on a commercial flight, ensuring it is never left unattended or delayed in cargo.
ObcWhatIs.p3: This hand‑carry method is used for time‑critical, high‑value, or sensitive shipments, guaranteeing priority handling, direct supervision, and the shortest possible delivery time.

ObcWhyImportant.title: When every minute counts
ObcWhyImportant.description: OBC services keep operations running in aviation, automotive, tech, and manufacturing by eliminating delays and maintaining custody at every step.

0.title: Zero Room for Error
0.description: Avoid misrouting, loss, or delays common in standard air cargo with hand-carry supervision.

1.title: Immediate Availability
1.description: Your shipment moves on the next available flight not in days.

2.title: Continuous Control
2.description: Courier handles customs, security, and delivery personally no third‑party handovers.

3.title: Peace of Mind
3.description: Live status updates ensure full visibility from pickup to final handover.

4.title: Critical for Urgent Industries
4.description: Ideal for AOG parts, prototypes, sensitive items, and confidential documents.

ObcWhyChoose.title: Precision‑driven hand‑carry logistics
ObcWhyChoose.description: A distinct operating model that pairs rapid mobilization with continuous custody.

stats.title: Built for Critical Missions
stats.subtitle: Hand‑carry operations with auditable custody and proactive exception handling.

0.title: Speed You Can Rely On
0.description: Next available flight no cargo wait or consolidation delays.

1.title: Maximum Security
1.description: Continuous custody from check‑in to customs to handover.

2.title: Real‑Time Updates
2.description: Live notifications for flight status and delivery confirmation.

3.title: Global Coverage
3.description: Rapid mobilization across Europe, Asia, Middle East, North America.

FmlmBanner.title: Bridging every mile from pickup to delivery, with no delays.
FmlmBanner.description: Seamless ground transport connecting airports, warehouses, and destinations with speed, precision, and 24/7 availability worldwide.

FmlmWhatIs.badge: What Is First Mile / Last Mile Delivery?
FmlmWhatIs.title: Every shipment begins with a first mile and ends with a last mile and both are critical.

firstMile.title: First Mile Delivery
firstMile.description: Transporting goods from the shipper's location (like a warehouse or supplier) to the next logistics point often the airport or freight forwarder.

lastMile.title: Last Mile Delivery
lastMile.description: The final stretch, moving shipments from the airport, customs warehouse, or terminal directly to the consignee's doorstep.

FmlmWhatIs.description: At OBC Care, we ensure both ends of the journey are handled with speed, precision, and care connecting your cargo from origin to destination seamlessly.

FmlmWhyImportant.badge: Why Is First & Last Mile Delivery Important?
FmlmWhyImportant.title: Even the fastest flight is only as efficient as the ground transport that supports it.
FmlmWhyImportant.description: Delays, mishandling, or poor coordination during the first or last mile can jeopardize entire operations, especially in time-critical industries.

0.title: Prevents Costly Delays
0.description: Proper timing ensures your shipment catches the next flight or reaches your client on time.

1.title: Ensures Shipment Integrity
1.description: Secure ground handling minimizes damage, loss, or misrouting.

2.title: Bridges Global Gaps
2.description: FM/LM services connect airports, warehouses, and destinations in one smooth flow.

3.title: Supports 24/7 Operations
3.description: Perfect for urgent AOG, automotive, or electronic shipments that can't wait.

4.title: Guarantees Accountability
4.description: Every handover and movement is tracked and reported.

FmlmSolutions.title: We understand that time is everything.
FmlmSolutions.description: That's why OBC Care's First Mile / Last Mile Delivery is designed for efficiency, visibility, and reliability from pickup to delivery.

CustomsBanner.title: Fast. Compliant. Stress-free.
CustomsBanner.description: We handle the paperwork so your shipment crosses borders without a hitch.

CustomsWhatIs.title: Clearing Borders, Simplifying Logistics
CustomsWhatIs.description1: International trade can be complex but with OBC Care, customs clearance becomes simple, swift, and worry-free.
CustomsWhatIs.description2: Our dedicated team handles all import and export requirements with precision and full compliance, ensuring your shipments move seamlessly from one country to the next without costly delays or document errors.
CustomsWhatIs.solutionDesc: Customs Clearance Assistance is a full-service solution that manages the legal and administrative steps required to move goods across international borders.
CustomsWhatIs.checkText: Our team prepares and files documentation, coordinates with customs authorities, and ensures shipments meet all import/export regulations so they can be released quickly and legally.

CustomsWhyImportant.title: Customs clearance is critical because it:

0.title: Prevents Costly Delays
0.desc: Avoids demurrage fees and storage penalties by ensuring timely clearance.

1.title: Ensures Legal Compliance
1.desc: Avoids fines or seizure by meeting all import/export regulations.

2.title: Speeds Up Release
2.desc: Time-critical shipments can proceed to delivery without unnecessary delays.

3.title: Protects High-Value Cargo
3.desc: Proper classification and handling for sensitive or valuable shipments.

0.title: Import & Export Declarations
0.desc: Provides guidance and assistance to help navigate import and export processes efficiently.

1.title: Duties, Taxes & Tariff Guidance
1.desc: We advise and communicate applicable duties and taxes, helping you prepare for potential charges.

2.title: Permit & License Coordination
2.desc: Support the coordination of special permits and licenses required for your shipment.

3.title: Airport & Border Handling
3.desc: Coordinates with airport customs and ground handlers for swift release.

4.title: Special Cargo Clearance
4.desc: Expert handling of restricted, high-value, or temperature-sensitive shipments.

CustomsProcess.title: From Documentation to Delivery
CustomsProcess.description: A streamlined process ensuring your shipment clears customs efficiently and reaches its destination.

0.title: Document Verification
0.desc: We pre-check all paperwork before dispatch to avoid any clearance rejection.

1.title: Customs Submission
1.desc: Our licensed agents handle filing, coordination, and customs communication.

2.title: Real-Time Updates
2.desc: Receive instant status updates every step of the way.

3.title: Final Release & Delivery
3.desc: Once cleared, we arrange immediate transport to your destination.

CustomsWhyChoose.title: Excellence in Every Clearance
CustomsWhyChoose.description: Our comprehensive customs solutions ensure your shipments clear borders with speed, compliance, and complete transparency.

0.title: Global Expertise, Local Compliance
0.desc: Our knowledge of both international and country-specific customs ensures fast and lawful clearance.

1.title: 24/7 Monitoring & Updates
1.desc: Stay informed with live progress reports and milestone updates.

2.title: Zero Delay Commitment
2.desc: We act fast to prevent demurrage fees and storage penalties.

3.title: All-in-One Logistics Partner
3.desc: From pickup to final handover OBC Care manages it all with precision and transparency.

CustomsNetwork.title: Global Customs Partners, Local Expertise
CustomsNetwork.description1: Our customs partners and licensed agents operate across major trade lanes and key airports worldwide ensuring fast, compliant clearance across regions.
CustomsNetwork.description2: We coordinate local expertise with global oversight so your shipment doesn't stop at the border.

NfoBanner.badge: OBC Care – Next Flight Out (NFO) Solutions
NfoBanner.title: When every minute counts, we get your shipment on the very next flight.
NfoBanner.description: From AOG emergencies to urgent production parts, OBC Care delivers the fastest possible transport solution with 24/7 coordination and full shipment visibility.

NfoIntro.title: Time-Critical Logistics Without Compromise
NfoIntro.imageCardText1: Delays aren't an option when critical operations depend on your shipment's arrival.
NfoIntro.imageCardText2: That's why OBC Care's Next Flight Out (NFO) service prioritizes your cargo on the earliest available flight ensuring zero downtime, full visibility, and guaranteed speed.
NfoIntro.textCard1: Our global team monitors every route, flight schedule, and customs requirement in real time, arranging the quickest and most reliable path from pickup to delivery.
NfoIntro.textCard2: Whether it's aviation parts, automotive components, or electronic equipment, our NFO service keeps your business moving no matter where you are in the world.

NfoWhatIs.badge: What Is a Next Flight Out (NFO) Service?
NfoWhatIs.title: Next Flight Out (NFO) is the fastest air freight solution for time-critical shipments.

card1.title: Fastest Booking
card1.desc: Your cargo is booked on the very next available commercial or cargo flight.

card3.title: Minimize Downtime
card3.desc: Avoiding operational losses with guaranteed speed and reliability.

NfoWhatIs.description1: It ensures that your cargo is booked on the very next available commercial or cargo flight minimizing downtime and avoiding operational losses.
NfoWhatIs.description2: At OBC Care, we combine real-time routing, dedicated handling, and expert coordination to move your shipment across borders at record speed.

NfoWhyImportant.title: In time-sensitive industries, even a short delay can lead to major disruptions.
NfoWhyImportant.subtitle: Our NFO service is designed to:

0.title: Same-Day Dispatch
0.desc: Guarantee same-day dispatch on the next available flight.

1.title: Prevent Halts
1.desc: Prevent costly production or operational halts.

2.title: Real-Time Visibility
2.desc: Ensure real-time visibility throughout the journey.

3.title: Global Transport
3.desc: Provide reliable, secure, and fully compliant transport anywhere in the world.

NfoWhyImportant.ctaDesc: Get your shipment on the next available flight with our 24/7 NFO service.

NfoHowItWorks.title: From Request to Delivery In Record Time
NfoHowItWorks.description: A streamlined 5-step process ensuring your time-critical shipment reaches its destination on the next available flight.

0.title: Immediate Booking & Route Planning

4.title: Fast Final Delivery
4.desc: Once landed, we handle customs clearance and deliver your shipment straight to its destination.

IndustriesBanner.title: Delivering reliability across every sector from aircraft engines to microchips, OBC Care ensures time critical shipments reach their destination safely and on time.
IndustriesBanner.description: When speed meets precision, every industry moves forward.

IndustriesIntro.text: At OBC Care, we specialise in moving mission-critical shipments for industries where speed, precision and reliability are non-negotiable. Whether it's an aircraft on ground, a factory line waiting for parts, or sensitive data that can't be delayed – our global network delivers.

IndustriesSupported.title: Serving Every Sector with Precision
IndustriesSupported.description: From aviation to technology, we deliver mission-critical shipments across industries where downtime isn't an option.

0.title: Aviation & AOG Parts

AboutBanner.title: ABOUT US
AboutBanner.description: Driven by Passion. Defined by Precision. Delivered with Care.
AboutBanner.description2: At OBC Care, we move more than shipments we move trust, reliability, and human dedication across borders

AboutIntro.title: Company Background
AboutIntro.p1: OBC Care was founded in 2018 by Eugen Reimer with a clear and strategic vision: to connect global markets through dependable, time-critical logistics solutions built on precision, accountability, and operational excellence. From the outset, the company focused on providing reliable on-board courier and urgent shipping services designed to meet the most demanding deadlines.
AboutIntro.p2: What began as a small, dedicated team has evolved into a trusted global logistics network, serving clients across multiple industries, including aviation, technology, and other mission critical sectors. Today, OBC Care is recognized for its ability to manage complex, urgent shipments with consistency, professionalism, and a strong commitment to service quality.
AboutIntro.quote: “Urgent logistics isn’t just about speed, it’s about trust, precision, and people who care.”
AboutIntro.p3: Today, OBC Care continues that legacy, ensuring every delivery reflects the same passion and reliability that started it all.

hero.description: Join Our Global Network of Professional Hand-Carry Couriers.
hero.description2: When every minute matters, we rely on skilled and trustworthy couriers to handcarry urgent shipments worldwide. If you’re responsible, travel ready, and able to act fast under pressure, you may be the perfect fit for our OBC team.

joinNetwork.title: Join Our Network of 1,200+ Couriers Worldwide
joinNetwork.description: Thank you for your interest in becoming an Onboard Courier (OBC). Whether you are an experienced courier or someone looking to be part of time-critical logistics, we invite you to register your details through our OBC Portal. Simply click the button below and complete the registration form.

requirements.0: Must be at least 18 years old

joinNetwork.note: * Holding valid visas is a strong advantage.

whyBecomeObc.title: Why You Should Become an Onboard Courier

0.title: Every Day Is a New Adventure
0.description: No two days are ever the same. One mission may take you across Europe delivering critical machinery; the next may have you hand-carrying urgent documents on a domestic flight. It’s a career built on excitement and purpose.

1.title: Think Fast, Act Faster
1.description: Delays happen. Plans change. Challenges appear without warning. Great couriers adapt quickly, stay calm under pressure, and always find a solution. If you thrive in fast-moving environments, this role is for you.

2.title: A World of Experiences
2.description: Each assignment introduces you to new places, cultures, and people. It’s not just a job; it’s a gateway to global exposure, personal growth, and meaningful professional connections.

3.title: Never a Boring Day
3.description: Every shipment tells a different story. From aircraft parts to medical samples and urgent legal documents, every delivery is unique, and so is every challenge you overcome.

cta.title: Ready to Become an OBC?
cta.description: Join a trusted global team and experience the world while delivering time-critical shipments safely and professionally.
